name: Slew rate limiter
description: Smooths CVs and creates glissandos. Simple slew rate limiter, offering both logarithmic and linear slew. Use a single slew rate for both rising and falling signals, or specify them separately. Rates can be set per-bus or commonly.

specifications.name: Channels
specifications.description: The number of bus channels to process.

parameters.name: Through
parameters.description: If enabled, the algorithm behaves as if all slew times were set to zero.

parameters.name: Up/shared slew
parameters.description: The slew time for both, or only rising, signals.

parameters.name: Down slew
parameters.description: The slew time for falling signals.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: Chooses Logarithmic or Linear slew rate limiting.

parameters.name: Control
parameters.description: Chooses which controls will set the slew times.

parameters.name: Up/shared slew
parameters.description: The slew time for both, or only rising, signals (used if Control is 'Single' or 'Dual').

parameters.name: Down slew
parameters.description: The slew time for falling signals (used if Control is 'Dual').
